summary: We get no explanations when we're entering the last desperate minutes of three mens lives, all being violent to the women they love. We understand there's a reason behind the three mens reactions. What lies behind?
cast: Bjørn Floberg|Ola Færden|Fred Heggland|Aksel Hennie|Annmari Kastrup|Caisanne Lund|Megan Matovich|Mads Ousdal|André Bjørn Røine|Pia Tjelta|Kaia Varjord
title: 90 minutter
